item.title: Beta Launch
item.description: Feature List These are the current features for the beta. The bot will continue to get new features over time. Commands Basic commands. !command triggers a set response Command variables. Data that is inserted into the code after evaluation. ex. $time returns the current time to the command. Cooldowns. You can set a cooldown for your commands. Note that any command triggers a cooldown and the cooldown affects all other commands.
